app_sentences.cn: 你应该认真对待你的学习以取得好成绩。

app_sentences.en: With hard work, you can achieve your goals in life.
app_sentences.cn: 通过努力，你可以实现你的人生目标。

app_sentences.en: With enough practice, you can achieve your goal of swimming well.
app_sentences.cn: 通过足够的练习，你可以达到游好泳的目标。

app_sentences.en: We learned about the geographical features of Asia in class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在课堂上学习了亚洲的地理特征。

app_sentences.en: The discovery of penicillin was very important for medicine.
app_sentences.cn: 青霉素的发现对医学非常重要。

app_sentences.en: We reached the mountain peak after a long and difficult climb.
app_sentences.cn: 经过漫长而艰难的攀登，我们到达了山顶。

app_sentences.en: Always tell the truth, even when it is difficult to do so.
app_sentences.cn: 永远要说实话，即使这样做很困难。

app_sentences.en: You should always tell the truth to your parents and teachers.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该永远对父母和老师说真话。

app_sentences.en: It took us two hours to climb to the top of the hill.
app_sentences.cn: 我们花了两个小时爬到了小山顶。

app_sentences.en: They like to climb mountains to enjoy the fresh air.
app_sentences.cn: 他们喜欢爬山以享受新鲜空气。
